definition: willingness/would rather (agree to X than Y)
to be willing to/to be ready to/to be content with/accepting (of restriction, sacrifice, risk etc)
to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
to abandon oneself (idiom)/to let oneself go
to accept misfortunes as decreed by fate/to be resigned to sth
to give up/to abandon (a goal etc)/to let sth go/forget it/let the matter drop
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
